result.execSummary:
The defendant Fantasia C Troxel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant will be required to repay Richland County for the costs of Attorney Lawrence's services in this case.  The amount, once known, will be added to the fine and costs ordered as the penalty in this case.  The Court will allow the Defendant to continue on a payment plan with the Clerk of Court - payments to continue at the rate of $50/month.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Fantasia C Troxel

ADDRESS INFO for Fantasia C Troxel
Current: Headquarters Batallion 1st Marine Division, Box 555381, Camp Pendleton, CA 92055-5381 United States  (Effective: 12-06-2016)
Prior: 127 Wildwood Ct, Boscobel, WI 53805 United States

1:42 p.m.  Attorney Peter K. Lawrence in court for Defendant Fantasia C Troxel. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Fantasia C Troxel appeared by electronic means via Skype, arranged by Atty. Lawrence and approved by the Court prior to this appearance.  Court notes that Skype is the functional equivalent of video appearance and such has been allowed in State v. Soto.  Court finds connection is adequate for purpose of moving forward with plea as proposed by counsel.  Def addresses the Court; unable to be here today due to her present military assignment in San Diego, CA.  Def pleads guilty.  Court's colloquy on plea.
phone call from Atty. Lawrence - offers to set up video or Skype appearance for def's 12/6 status/resolution; will speak with the Court about the possibilities
Payment Plan Due Date Summary, Copy of Order Appointing Attorney, & Copy of Payment Plan Form - Not Deliverable As Addressed, Unable to Forward -  Found same address on Clear, Attempting to resend
Status conference on December 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Peter K. Lawrence in court for Defendant Fantasia C Troxel.  Def is stationed in CA with the Marines.  Atty. Lawrence appears on her behalf by authorization; enters NG plea on def's behalf. Atty. L asks for next date sooner rather than later; notes this is ADA Forehand's case.  Court sets status for 12/6 at 1:30.  Status conference scheduled for December 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
